metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12673 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Dovecot before 2.3.11.3, sending a specially formatted NTLM request will crash the auth service because of an out-of-bounds read.

notes.Note: leosilva> marking precise as ignored since we won't fix it version in that release is quite old and the backports could possibly cause serious regressions.

criterions.comment: dovecot: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
